text:
Every time I step into the club I get my shit on
Hugging all the animals and veggies like a vegan
All the misery and negativity can be gone
Dancing is a positive so let me do a recon

Take me to the tables and I bet you everything I got
I'll shake a pair of dice and confidently bet all that I got
That even you can find the rhythm at the table where you sit
Cos all you gotta do is just a wiggle a bit

If you feel the rhythm and if you feel the beat
You got to dance dance dance your way over to me
But if you got no rhythm and stuck with two left feet
Here's your chance chance chance so just listen to me

All you gotta do is just wiggle a bit

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this one?

snow is still falling,
is it time for apres yet?
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat
